summary: There is nothing more metal than killing a dragon with a pointy guitar.
descriptionHtml:
[center] Are you frustrated by the constant presence of Fenders and Gibsons? Where is the metal? Do you wonder why there is only inferior guitar mods? Not enough metal. I give you a true work of stringed art. Nothing is more metal than killing a dragon with a pointy guitar!

Version 7 adds different guitar chords and stuff for bashing and poking. Write your own symphony of destruction!


My B.C. Rich Warlock NJ

Quilt maple top.
Mahogany body.
Widow headstock.
Neck through construction.
25 1/2 inch scale neck with 24 frets.
Diamond inlays of pearl in an ebony fret board.
Stainless steel frets.
EMG 89 neck pickup and EMG 85 bridge pickup, both "split coil".
Floyd Rose Speedloader bridge.

Black B.C. Rich Warlock NJ

Mahogany body.
Widow headstock.
Neck through construction.
25 1/2 inch scale neck with 24 frets.
Diamond inlays of pearl in an ebony fret board.
Stainless steel frets.
EMG 85 neck pickup and EMG 83 bridge pickup.
Floyd Rose bridge.


Craft under Daedric. Even includes a scored Slayer pick.

This Warlock is technically a greatsword, but only for the sake of animations and speed. It is Daedric level+ at a base damage of 28.

This is a hand made model with textures by myself. I put a stupid level of detail in it. I love my guitar, now I kill with it. I am still updating this mod with fixes and features. Check the change logs, as the pictures will almost always be out-dated. The plan is to finish the internal components and take the panels off the back. Real metals guitars has no panels ons them. :)


[credits]
Bethesda
3DS Max
Gimp
Slayer
B.C. Rich
Kryptonian
MurdermiesteR (me)[/center]
author: MurdermiesteR
